subtitle: Fresh strawberries are used in this mouthwatering dessert.

method.text: Melt the butter in a small pan. Stir in the flour. Cook over a low heat for 1 min.
Add the sugar. Gradually stir in the cream and milk. Bring the mixture to the boil. Cook for 1 min.
Remove from the heat. Beat in the egg yolks. Allow the mixture to cool slighly. Stir in the vanilla essence.

Whisk the egg whites until stiff but not dry. Carefully fold into the souffle mixture with a large metal spoon. Pour the mixture into small greased individual souffle or ramekin dishes. Place on a baking tray.
Bake until well risen and golden.
Meanwhile, prepare the sauce: Place the strawberries. sugar and the water into a small pan. Bring to the boil. Simmer for 2 min. Sieve the sauce. Pour into a serving jug.
As soon as the souffles are cooked, serve with the warm strawberry sauce poured into the centre of each souffle.

title: Hot vanilla souffle with strawberry sauce
